tasks.label: Run fms-forwarder
args: cd ../.. && docker compose --profile fms up --detach && docker compose logs -f fms-forwarder influxDB csv-provider-fms databroker && cd components/fms-forwarder && docker exec -it influxDB cat /tmp/out/fms-demo.token > /tmp/influxdb.token && cargo run --bin fms-forwarder influx --influxdb-uri http://influxdb:8086 --influxdb-token-file /tmp/influxdb.token
